channel.title: I got this errorr i can't fix
channel.description:
[code] NPCHandler.java:987: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
And i'm really to tired and pissed off at this errorr to figure out how to fix it. please help

item.title: I got this errorr i can't fix
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:10, topic:145498”]Add a } above that boolean so it’s
}
public static boolean blahblah[/quote]
That didnt work…
